Pros:
It's on Steam.
Achievements.

Cons:
Terrible downgrade over OW 1 so many missing features, OW 1 was invaded by a parasite and reborn with less features, 5v5 that fundamentally does not work for the game, there used to be a push pull in the game that was very satisfying, OW 2 doesn't have that it's either you are pushing hard and the other team is getting roasted or you are getting pushed and roasted you either feel like when you were winning the push in ow 2 or you feel like you losing there is no middle ground anymore, and the balancing is horrendous.

The game used to feel at least somewhat rewarding back in OW 1 like you could still play and earn rewards the gameplay loop was fun in it self with the loot boxes you could get skins and coins to save up and buy your most wanted skin, and it was rewarding to see that you did well in games with the gold coins at the end of the game with the extra stats there were so many good things in OW 1 but now you have to sell your soul and your kidney and grind so many hours to do challenges for a chance at a sticker or skin and since the game isn't fun there just isn't a point to even playing anymore I really tried to like it when it came out but it just doesn't work and it's not fun or rewarding to play. 

Not to mention all the new bugs. 
Don't invest yourself in this game, and don't waste your money on a company that hates you and doesn't respect you, your time, your wallet or your investment in them. Go play Baldurs Gate 3 or BattleBit, maybe TF2.

ã€‚

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

Don't play this game. Don't spend any money on this garbage game.
Just let it die, like its esport.
Major Flaws:
1. Incompetent and lieing Devs
They promised a PVE Mode, which got cancelled after they raked in the money from the players. On top of that they wasted multiple years and added 0 content to overwatch 1. They cant even add a hero every season? What the fuck did they do all the years?
2. Matchmaking
The matchmaking is absolute trash. Either you get the good ol' "Failed to connect to the server" error or you get a typical coin toss match-up. You either roll or get rolled.
3. The Battlepass
Probably the worst battlepass in gaming - you get 0 premium currency to buy the next battlepass or save enough for skins etc.. Even the most predatory gatchagame garbage gives you something. Moreover the new characters are locked behind this shitty battlepass system.

Just do yourself a favor and dont play this shit. Soon you will probably read the headline that they will stop the support for this game. (HOTS 2.0)
The devs are an absolute joke.

They took away Overwatch 1 and forced a free to play business model, which leans more heavily into microtransactions, overpriced skins and predatory behaviour. No compensation for people who paid full price for a game they can no longer play.

You'd think it at least it will have a promised PvE Hero mode that would feature character progression, which was a main part of the gameâ€™s selling point? no, that was cancelled. but you can buy a lighter story mission for "only" $15

Don't support this scummy business model, move on
